articles.title: South Africa's Cyril Ramaphosa hits back after Donald Trump says US won't invite it for G20 summit - BBC
articles.description: The US boycotted the G20 summit in Johannesburg over widely discredited claims of persecution of the white minority.
articles.content: South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa has described as "regrettable" the announcement by US President Donald Trump that South Africa would not be invited to take part in next year's G20 summit in … [+2641 chars]
